text: hi
Hello there!
yes ism there
How are you?
I Am Fine, What about you?
I am doing well, thank you. Are you familiar with Save the Children?
Yes, I'm familiar with save the children. What about you?
I am not too familiar with that particular organization. Can you tell me something about them?
I Am also not too much familiar just I know what is Children charity.
Do you donate to those charities?
Yes, But for the past one year I did not give any donation. What about you?
I have not donated to any yet. How much do you donate on average?
I donate averagely 50 Dollars.
Wow that is wonderful. What organizations have you donated to?
I forget the organisation name.
That is okay. I would like to find a good organization to donate to toay. Would you do the same?
Yes, But i don't know about organization.

Well Save the Children is an international non-governmental organisation that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries. A $5 donation would be great I believe. That sounds wonderful don't you agree?
Yes, I agree that I save the children. I do my best to save the children without parents. What about you?
I donated $5 just right now. You should do the same!
